title: Maintenance and Operation
content:
Maintenance and Operation

State Regulations
§ 10.20 - General cleanliness
§ 10.21 - Walls, ceilings and fixtures
§ 10.22 - Spitting
§ 10.23 - Sanitary services
§ 10.24 - Sanitation of equipment and implements
§ 10.25 - Shaving brushes, mugs and finger bowls
§ 10.26 - Alum or other astringents
§ 10.27 - Neck dusters, powder puffs and sponges

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
